law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 43, effective June 26, 2009.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/24/2015). 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 4 provides that the amendments made to this statute in that Act apply to taxable periods beginning on or after January 1, 2015.
